title: Dev Certification for Android
description: This certification validates advanced Android development skills, including building complex UIs, managing data with Room and Paging, scheduling background tasks with WorkManager/AlarmManager, implementing notifications, debugging with Android Studio, and ensuring quality through UI testing.
